title: Stocks Get AI Boost Before Earnings, Fed Decision: Markets Wrap
description: Asian indexes advanced on optimism that artificial intelligence will continue to drive profits at megacap technology companies reporting earnings this week, amid growing bets on a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut. MSCI’s regional stock index rose 0.4%, with the tech sector outperforming and chip-related stocks such as SK Hynix Inc. and Advantest Corp. jumping after strong earnings.
content:
Asian indexes advanced on optimism that artificial intelligence will continue to drive profits at megacap technology companies reporting earnings this week, amid growing bets on a Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.

title: Natural Gas: A Permanent Player in the Energy Arena
description: Natural gas, once considered merely a transitional fuel, is now seen as a permanent element in the energy landscape, according to Ashraf Al Ghazzawi of Saudi Aramco. He noted that natural gas is crucial in supporting the growth driven by artificial intelligence demand.
content: In a significant development for the energy sector, Ashraf Al Ghazzawi, Saudi Aramco's Executive Vice President for Strategy and Corporate Development, announced on Wednesday that natural gas has shifted its role from a transitional fuel to a lasting... [486 chars]

title: AI Earnings Strength Widens to More Stocks to Allay Bubble Fears
description: A brighter earnings outlook for artificial-intelligence companies is allaying concerns that the AI-led global equity rally is in a bubble territory after hitting records.
content:

title: Asian Markets Surge Amid AI Buzz and Fed Anticipations
description: Asian financial markets gained momentum on Wednesday, driven by investor optimism surrounding artificial intelligence and upcoming major announcements from the Federal Reserve and tech giants. Strong performances from companies like Nvidia and Microsoft contributed to Wall Street hitting record highs, influencing global market trends.
content: Asian markets experienced a remarkable lift on Wednesday, largely due to optimism surrounding artificial intelligence advancements and anticipated key announcements from the Federal Reserve and technology powerhouses. The potential for lower U.S. int... [972 chars]

title: Before Trump lands in Seoul, US and South Korea sign AI deal - to secure edge over China
description: Under the agreement, the two nations will collaborate to tighten export controls on artificial intelligence and ease regulatory hurdles for tech firms, aiming to simplify data storage and usage across borders
content:
The US and South Korea will sign an agreement to strengthen cooperation in artificial intelligence, quantum computing and 6G, as President Donald Trump reaches South Korea for the Apec Summit.

title: Ahead of GTA 6 launch, Take-Two CEO on why AI can never make a Grand Theft Auto game
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) has transformed the internet, with AI-generated content flooding our feeds. However, Strauss Zelnick, CEO of Take Two, the company that owns Rockstar Games, believes that AI will never be able to create a Grand Theft Auto game. GTA 6 is scheduled to release in May 2026.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is everywhere. Not just text, but AI-generated videos, dubbed ‘AI slop’, are flooding the internet, particularly on social media. Some gaming companies are taking things a step further with AI. Sony’s new AI-powered chara... [1901 chars]

title: Elon Musk Mocks Wikipedia, Claims Grokipedia Will Surpass Popular Online Encyclopedia 'In Breadth, Depth & Accuracy'
description: Developed by xAI, Musk’s artificial intelligence company and the creator of the chatbot Grok, Grokipedia is an AI-powered encyclopedia that aims to challenge what Musk calls a “woke” and biased Wikipedia.
content: New Delhi: Elon Musk on Wednesday took a dig at Wikipedia, claiming that his new platform Grokipedia will surpass the popular online encyclopedia “by several orders of magnitude in breadth, depth and accuracy.” Musk made the statement while respondin... [1884 chars]
